Opole.title: Opole
Opole.byline: Opole is the capital city of Opole Voivodeship, in south west Poland.

Opole Voivodeship.title: Opole Voivodeship
Opole Voivodeship.byline: Opole Voivodeship (Polish: województwo opolskie) is one of the 16 voivodeships (administrative provinces) of Poland.

Opononi.title: Opononi
Opononi.byline: Opononi and Omapere are two small towns linked by a ribbon of development on the Hokianga Harbour, west of Rawene, in the North Island of New Zealand.

Opotiki.title: Opotiki
Opotiki.byline: Opotiki is a small coastal town in the eastern Bay of Plenty on New Zealand's North Island.
